nodes.text: Ayalayli thornwood was a type of wood used in the construction of objects. The antique gong that Jabba the Hutt struck at the beginning of the Boonta Eve Classic in 32 BBY had a frame made of ayalayli thornwood.

Ayalayli thornwood was first identified in the Star Wars Legends reference book Star Wars: The Phantom Menace: The Expanded Visual Dictionary, the expanded version of the original Star Wars: Episode I The Visual Dictionary from 1999 that was released on January 16, 2012. It was reintroduced into canon in 2018 when it was included in Star Wars: The Complete Visual Dictionary, New Edition, which compiles all the previous entries in the Star Wars Visual Dictionaries series.
